item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on September 17 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on September 17 Now AvailablenewsOctober 14, 2025TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on September 17, 2025. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: CVE Podcast — The CVE Consumer Working Group (CWG)
item.description: CVE Podcast — The CVE Consumer Working Group (CWG)podcastOctober 14, 2025“We Speak CVE” podcast host Shannon Sabens chats withCVE Consumer Working Group (CWG)co-chairs, Jay Jacobs and Bob Lord, andCVE™Project Lead Alec Summers, about how the CWG was created to address the needs and perspectives of those who use CVE data — ranging from enterprise security teams to tool developers and managed security service providers — recognizing that their requirements and pain points often differ from those of upstream data providers.

item.title: The Browser Company of New York Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: The Browser Company of New York Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsOctober 14, 2025The Browser Company of New Yorkis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for The Browser Company of New York branded products and technologies only.

item.title: Foxit Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Foxit Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsOctober 14, 2025Foxit Software Incorporatedis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Foxit issues only.

item.title: CNAs — Register Now for the “CVE Program Technical Workshop 2025” on October 22 & 23, 2025
item.description: CNAs — Register Now for the “CVE Program Technical Workshop 2025” on October 22 & 23, 2025newsOctober 14, 2025The CVE Program will host a virtual “CVE Program Technical Workshop – Autumn 2025” forCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)on Wednesday, October 22, 2025, and Thursday, October 23, 2025, from 10:00 a.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT (UTC-4) on both days.This CNA workshop is free, but registration is required. Information on how to register was sent directly to CNAs on October 9, 2025. The registration deadline is 11:59 p.m. EDT (UTC-4) on October 21, 2025, so register today!

item.title: Happening This Week for CNAs — “CVE Program Technical Workshop 2025” on October 22 & 23, 2025
item.description: Happening This Week for CNAs — “CVE Program Technical Workshop 2025” on October 22 & 23, 2025newsOctober 22, 2025The CVE Program is hosting a virtual “CVE Program Technical Workshop – Autumn 2025” forCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)this week on Wednesday, October 22, 2025, and Thursday, October 23, 2025, from 10:00 a.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT (UTC-4) on both days. This CNA workshop is free, but registration is required.

item.title: Nutanix Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Nutanix Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsOctober 28, 2025Nutanixis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Nutanix issues only.

item.title: Django Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Django Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsOctober 28, 2025Django Software Foundationis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for only supported and end-of-life Django versions available athttps://www.djangoproject.com/download/and projects listed athttps://github.com/django(such as Django, channels, and daphne), excluding distributions maintained by third-party redistributors.

item.title: CVE Record Format Version 5.2.0 and CVE Services Version 2.6.0 Now Available
item.description: CVE Record Format Version 5.2.0 and CVE Services Version 2.6.0 Now AvailableblogBy CVE Program|October 29, 2025The CVE Program is pleased to announce the release ofCVE Record Format 5.2.0(viewrelease notes) andCVE Services 2.6.0(viewrelease notes). This newest version release of the CVE Record Format further enables support thePackage URL (PURL)specification for identifying software packages, components, and libraries inCVE Records. CVE Services was updated to support this new version of the CVE Record Format.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 252 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for November 3, 2025
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 252 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for November 3, 2025blogBy CVE Program|November 4, 2025
